description:
The battle between Kaido and Yamato gets intense. Backed into a corner, Yamato remembers three great swordsmen who he met when he was a child. Their stunning choice for the future of the Land of Wano encourages Yamato.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Future! Yamato and the Great Swordsmen`s Pledge
Für die Zukunft! – Yamato und der Schwur der großen Schwertkämpfer
Mirai e! Yamato to Daiken Gou no Chikai
Vers l`avenir. Yamato et le serment aux illustres samouraïs !
В будущее! Ямато и клятва великих мечников!
من أجل المستقبل! ياماتو وعهد السّيّافين العظماء!
未来へ! ヤマトと大剣豪の誓い
